headline: RBC Capital Lowers Mosaic (MOS) Outlook Following Earnings Miss and Cash Flow Concerns
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is included among the 13 Best Long-Term Dividend Stocks to Invest in Right Now. On February 26, RBC Capital lowered its price recommendation on The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) to $28 from $29. It maintained a Sector Perform rating on the stock after the company reported weaker-than-expected Q4 earnings. The firm believes […]

headline: Mosaic (MOS) Is Down 9.9% After Q4 Loss But Strong FY25 Profit – Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: The Mosaic Company reported its fourth-quarter 2025 results, with sales rising to US$2,973.7 million but swinging from US$169.0 million in net income a year earlier to a US$519.5 million net loss and a diluted loss per share from continuing operations of US$1.64. Despite that quarterly setback, full-year 2025 sales increased to US$12.05 billion and net income climbed to US$540.7 million, while management emphasized record mining output, cost savings and plans to lift phosphate and potash...
